::Lavatron::

Lavatron is hit in the back, growling and letting go of Surgital. He
jumps back, firing a large lightning bolt at the are where Wildrider
was.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> OOC: That's okay, yah dont need to say sorry.
> 
> BIC:
> Wildrider noticed the apprehension in Symphony, but he didn't care.
He
> aimed at Lavatron again, and kept up the pressure, firing a huge
spread
> of lasers from his gun.
